text.en: You can banish 1 monster you control, and 1 "Power Tool" Synchro Monster or 1 Level 7 or 8 Dragon Synchro Monster in your GY, then target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. Level 7 or higher Synchro Monsters you control gain 400 ATK for each of your banished Level 7 or higher Synchro Monsters. Once per turn, when an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have a banished Synchro Monster: You can negate the attack.
